text.align:
intro:
text types: here are few basic text types just inside parameters of <type> element. list of usages: <type type="bold">text</type> outputs : text <type type="italic">text</type> outputs: text <type type="underline">text</type> outputs: text <type type="code">text</type> outputs: text <type type="thin">text</type> outputs: text <type type="quote">text</type> outputs: text <type type="blink">text</type> outputs: text <type type="spoiler">text</type> outputs: text highlights: in this markup language highligher have predefined set of colors: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, purple and grey . example of usage: <highlight color="color">text<highlight> and outputs for example : text custom text styles:

moving marquee: test headings:
lists: a thing tables:
